Package org.apache.hadoop.hbase

Class StartMiniClusterOption.Builder

java.lang.Object
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.StartMiniClusterOption.Builder
Enclosing class:
StartMiniClusterOption
public static final class StartMiniClusterOption.Builder extends Object
Builder pattern for creating an StartMiniClusterOption. The default values of its fields should be considered public and constant. Changing the default values may cause other tests fail.
